Test Name: Streptococcus pneumoniae IgG Antibodies, Total (with Reflex)
Purpose: To accurately measure total IgG antibodies against Streptococcus pneumoniae (with reflex serotype-specific testing when indicated) for patient diagnosis and management.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: ELISA reader and washer, microtiter plates, pipettes, incubator
